DOC.brief_summary: to investigate the effect of the human incretin hormone GLP-1 on mesenteric blood flow and cardiac parameters
DOC.brief_title: GLP-1's Effect on Cardiac Parameters and Mesenteric Blood Flow
DOC.detailed_description: to investigate the effect of the human incretin hormone GLP-1 on mesenteric blood flow and cardiac parameters, in healthy subjects, 4 arms, task force monitor
DOC.keyword: effect of GLP-1 on cardiac parameters and blood flow
